text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Animal" means a living creature except a human being.

section.section: "Cruelty" means the unnecessary or unjustifiable physical pain or suffering caused or allowed by an act, omission, or neglect.

text.section: "Humane society" means a society or association incorporated in Maryland for the prevention of cruelty to animals.
